articles.description: Follow live text & radio commentary, score updates and match stats from the first leg of the League Cup semi-final between Arsenal and Newcastle United.

articles.description: After a report by the Melbourne Age suggests that plans for a two-tier World Test Championship would be discussed later this month, BBC Sport looks at the reaction so far.
articles.title: Two-tier World Test Championship - 'greedy' or needed for cricket to survive?

articles.description: Everton's goals-per-game ratio this season is the worst it has been in 13 years - could it mark the end for Sean Dyche's time as manager?
articles.title: Sean Dyche future: Could it be the end of Everton manager's tenure?

articles.description: Las Vegas Raiders' Antonio Pierce becomes the third NFL head coach to be fired following the end of the regular season.
articles.title: Las Vegas Raiders: Head coach Antonio Pierce sacked after regular NFL season

articles.description: Ange Postecoglou says even in-form Liverpool forward Mohamed Salah would find life a struggle at the moment in the Tottenham team he manages.
articles.title: Ange Postecoglou: Liverpool's Mohamed Salah would struggle in Tottenham team, says boss

articles.description: Villarreal's academy has trained stars like Rodri, Nicolas Jackson, Pau Torres and current winger Alex Baena.
articles.title: Inside the Villarreal academy that produced Rodri, Nicolas Jackson and Alex Baena

articles.description: Tyson Fury would be a "massive favourite" against Anthony Joshua, says Barry Jones - who wants to see the fight happen this year.
articles.title: Boxing: Tyson Fury would be 'massive favourite' against Anthony Joshua, says Barry Jones

articles.description: Novak Djokovic may be 37, but the 24-time Grand Slam champion can never be counted out as he aims to make more history in Melbourne.
articles.title: Novak Djokovic: Stefan Edberg and Billie Jean King on Serb's 2025

articles.description: Northern Ireland's Tom McKibbin is set for a shock switch to join Jon Rahm's LIV Golf team.
articles.title: Tom McKibbin: NI player set for shock LIV Golf switch with Jon Rahm

articles.description: Tottenham Hotspur trigger an option to extend forward Son Heung-min's contract by a year, until the summer of 2026.
articles.title: Son Heung-min: Tottenham Hotspur trigger option to extend forward's contract until 2026
